metadata.title: Portuguese Placement Test - Complete Curriculum (90 Units)
metadata.description: Comprehensive placement test covering all 90 curriculum units from Beginner (A1) to Upper-Intermediate (B2)
metadata.structure: Progressive difficulty from Unit 1 (absolute beginner) to Unit 90 (upper-intermediate synthesis)
metadata.note: Each question references its corresponding curriculum unit for precise placement

phases.name: Foundation (A1)
phases.description: Absolute beginner - basic identity, present tense, simple sentences

phases.name: Elementary (A2)
phases.description: Elementary - past tenses, questions, comparisons, daily life

phases.name: Intermediate (B1)
phases.description: Intermediate - complex tenses, vocabulary expansion, cultural contexts

phases.name: Upper-Intermediate (B2)
phases.description: Upper-intermediate - subjunctive, advanced grammar, colloquial speech, synthesis

questions.question: What does 'Eu sou professor' mean?
What does 'do' mean in 'Eu sou do Brasil'?
Which definite article is correct? '__ livros estão na mesa' (the books are on the table)

questions.pt: Eu tenho um carro e uma casa
questions.question: What does 'Eu tenho um carro e uma casa' mean?
questions.correct: I have a car and a house
options: I have a car and a house
I have the car and the house
I want a car and a house
I am a car and a house

questions.question: What does 'Eu estou no trabalho' mean?
Which is correct? 'A casa __'
What does 'Eu moro em São Paulo' mean?
What does 'Eu falo português' mean?
What does 'no' mean in 'Eu trabalho no banco'?
What does 'Eu estudo português' mean?

questions.unitName: Verb Ficar (to be located / to stay)
questions.question: What does 'A escola fica perto' mean?
What does 'Eu estou cansado' mean?
How do you say 'I'm at work' in Portuguese?
What does 'Meu pai e minha mãe' mean?
What does 'Eu não falo inglês' mean?
What does 'Eu tenho um carro' mean?

questions.unitName: Age with Ter (Eu tenho X anos)
questions.question: What does 'Eu tenho 25 anos' mean?
What does 'Você fala português?' mean?
What does 'Eu preciso de ajuda' mean?
What does 'Eu como arroz e feijão' mean?
options: How I eat rice and beans

questions.question: What does 'Eu bebo água' mean?
What does 'Eu como pão' mean?
Complete: 'Ele __ português' (falar)
What does 'Nós falamos português' mean?
What does 'Eu gosto de música' mean?
What does 'Eu abro a porta' mean?
What does 'Eu vou viajar amanhã' mean?
questions.correct: I am going to travel tomorrow
options: I am going to travel tomorrow

questions.question: What does 'Eles falam português' mean?
What does 'amanhã' mean?

questions.unitName: Common Question Words (Onde, O que, Quando)
questions.question: What does 'Onde você mora?' mean?
Why is it 'meu carro' but 'minha casa'?
questions.correct: Carro is masculine, casa is feminine
options: Carro is masculine, casa is feminine
Carro is singular, casa is plural
Carro is mine, casa is yours
Carro is new, casa is old

questions.question: What does 'Seu livro' mean?
What does 'Nossa casa' mean?
What does 'Eu falei com ela ontem' mean?
options: I used to speak with her

questions.question: What does 'Eu comi arroz' mean?
What does 'Eu fui ao Brasil' mean?
What does 'Eu tive uma reunião' mean?
What does 'Eu fiz o trabalho' mean?
What does 'Eu vi o filme' mean?
What does 'Eu pude ir' mean?

questions.unitName: Contractions with Preposition A (ao, à, aos, às)
questions.question: What does 'ao' mean in 'Vou ao mercado'?

questions.pt: Viajo para o Brasil por duas semanas
questions.question: What does 'Viajo para o Brasil por duas semanas' mean?
questions.correct: I travel to Brazil for two weeks
options: I travel to Brazil for two weeks
I travel from Brazil for two weeks
I travel through Brazil in two weeks
I travel around Brazil by two weeks

questions.pt: Eu tenho vinte e cinco anos
questions.question: What number is 'vinte e cinco'?
What does 'mil' mean?
What does 'Eu morava em São Paulo' mean?
questions.correct: I used to live in São Paulo
options: I used to live in São Paulo
I will live in São Paulo

questions.unitName: Imperfect Tense - Irregular Verbs (ser, ter, vir)
questions.question: What does 'Eu era jovem' mean?
questions.correct: I was young / I used to be young
options: I was young / I used to be young

questions.pt: João é mais alto que Pedro
questions.question: What does 'João é mais alto que Pedro' mean?
options: João is as tall as Pedro
João is less tall than Pedro

questions.pt: Ele é o mais alto da classe
questions.question: What does 'Ele é o mais alto da classe' mean?
questions.correct: He is the tallest in the class
options: He is the tallest in the class
He is taller than the class
He is very tall in class
He is as tall as the class

questions.question: What time is 'São três horas'?
What does 'segunda-feira' mean?
What does 'Meu aniversário é em junho' mean?
What is special about saying the 1st of the month?
What does 'Moro no terceiro andar' mean?
questions.correct: I live on the third floor
options: I live on the third floor
I live on the four floor
I live in the third apartment

questions.question: What does 'Faz calor hoje' mean?
Where does the color adjective usually go in Portuguese?
What is notable about 'calça' (pants) in Portuguese?
questions.correct: It's singular, not plural like English
options: It's singular, not plural like English

questions.question: What does 'Minha cabeça dói' mean?
What does 'Meus avós' mean?

questions.pt: Eu estou feliz / Eu tenho fome
questions.question: What do these sentences mean? 'Eu estou feliz' and 'Eu tenho fome'
questions.correct: I am happy / I am hungry
options: I am happy / I am hungry
I am happy / I have food
I stay happy / I have hunger
I feel happy / I want food

questions.pt: O livro está em cima da mesa
questions.question: What does 'em cima de' mean?
What does 'Minha casa tem três quartos' mean?
What does 'Eu acordo às sete horas' mean?
options: I go to bed at 7 o'clock

questions.pt: Eu sempre estudo / Eu nunca trabalho aos domingos
questions.question: What do these sentences mean?
questions.correct: I always study / I never work on Sundays
options: I always study / I never work on Sundays
I often study / I rarely work on Sundays
I study forever / I don't work on Sundays
I am studying / I never worked Sundays

questions.pt: Eu gosto de arroz e feijão
questions.question: What is 'arroz e feijão' in Brazilian culture?
What is the exception to using 'de' with transportation?

questions.pt: Eu jogo futebol / Eu toco piano
questions.question: What do these sentences mean?
questions.correct: I play soccer / I play piano
options: I play soccer / I play piano
I like soccer / I touch piano
I watch soccer / I study piano
I practice soccer / I have a piano

questions.question: What does 'Eu ligo para você' mean?
What does 'Quanto custa?' mean?

questions.pt: Eu sou professor / Ela é médica
questions.question: What do these sentences mean?
questions.correct: I am a teacher / She is a doctor
options: I am a teacher / She is a doctor
I am the teacher / She is the doctor
I work as teacher / She works as doctor
I have a teacher / She has a doctor

questions.question: What does 'Eu estou doente' mean?
What does 'Fale português!' mean?

questions.pt: Este livro é meu, esse carro é seu, aquela casa é dela
questions.question: What does this sentence mean?
questions.correct: This book is mine, that car is yours, that house (over there) is hers
options: This book is mine, that car is yours, that house (over there) is hers
This book is mine, this car is yours, this house is hers
The book is mine, the car is yours, the house is hers
These books are mine, those cars are yours, those houses are hers

questions.question: What does 'Na sala tem um sofá' mean?
questions.correct: In the living room there's a sofa
options: In the living room there's a sofa
The living room has a sofa
I have a sofa in the room
The sofa is in the room

questions.question: What does 'Eu tenho um cachorro' mean?
What does 'Eu estudo matemática e história' mean?
options: I study the math and the history

questions.question: What does 'Eu falarei com você amanhã' mean?
questions.correct: I will speak with you tomorrow
options: I will speak with you tomorrow
I am going to speak with you tomorrow
I would speak with you tomorrow

questions.question: What does 'Gostaria de um café' mean and why is this form used?
questions.correct: I would like a coffee (polite request)
options: I would like a coffee (polite request)

questions.pt: Onde é que você mora? / O que é que você quer?
questions.question: What do these questions mean?
questions.correct: Where do you live? / What do you want?
options: Where do you live? / What do you want?
Where is it that you live? / What is it that you want?
Where were you living? / What did you want?
Where are you going? / What do you have?

questions.pt: Vou à praia às três horas
questions.question: What does 'Vou à praia às três horas' mean?
questions.correct: I'm going to the beach at 3 o'clock
options: I'm going to the beach at 3 o'clock
I go to the beach for three hours
I went to a beach at three hours
I will go the beach by three o'clock

questions.pt: Todo dia eu estudo / Tudo bem?
questions.question: What do these sentences mean?
questions.correct: Every day I study / Everything okay?
options: Every day I study / Everything okay?
All day I study / All is well?
The whole day I study / Is everything good?
Each day I studied / Was everything okay?

questions.question: What does 'Espero que ele fale português' mean?
options: I expect that he spoke Portuguese
I hope that he will speak Portuguese
I wait for him to speak Portuguese

questions.pt: Espero que você fale português / Espero que ele coma bem
questions.question: What do these sentences mean?
questions.correct: I hope you speak Portuguese / I hope he eats well
options: I hope you speak Portuguese / I hope he eats well
I hope you spoke Portuguese / I hope he ate well
I expect you to speak Portuguese / I expect him to eat well
I wait for you to speak Portuguese / I wait for him to eat well

questions.question: What is the present subjunctive of 'estar' for 'você'?

questions.pt: Se eu fosse rico, eu viajaria
questions.question: What does 'Se eu fosse rico, eu viajaria' mean?
questions.correct: If I were rich, I would travel
options: If I were rich, I would travel
If I was rich, I traveled
When I am rich, I will travel
Because I am rich, I travel

questions.pt: Quando eu tiver tempo, vou viajar
questions.question: What does 'Quando eu tiver tempo, vou viajar' mean?
questions.correct: When I have time, I will travel
options: When I have time, I will travel
When I had time, I traveled
If I have time, I would travel
While I have time, I am traveling

questions.question: What is the formal version of 'Cê tá indo pra casa?'
What does 'esta semana' mean?
What function does 'então' serve in 'Então, você vai viajar?'
What does 'Está para chover' mean?

questions.pt: Se eu tivesse estudado mais, teria passado no exame que foi ontem. Agora, espero que eu possa tentar de novo no mês que vem.
questions.question: This sentence integrates how many different tenses/moods?
questions.correct: 5 (imperfect subjunctive, conditional, preterite, present subjunctive, present)
options: 5 (imperfect subjunctive, conditional, preterite, present subjunctive, present)

phase1.description: Basic identity, present tense, simple sentences

phase2.description: Past tenses, questions, comparisons, daily life

phase3.description: Complex tenses, expanded vocabulary, cultural contexts

phase4.description: Subjunctive mood, advanced grammar, colloquial speech
